How to connect 2 device with 2 mode Watch and Select. See ID from device which is run in Watch mode. In device run Select mode, we click Connect button. Enter value of ID then click Connect. In device run Watch mode,waiting until accept popup appear, click Connect button This page show list of selected video. This page is used to search video.
